title: Emerson MW7601SL Compact Countertop Microwave Oven with Sleek Mirrored Finish Door 10 Power Levels, 6 Auto Menus, Glass Turntable and Child Safe Lock, 0.7 Cu. Ft, Silver
description: Tired of microwaved meals that leave you disappointed? The Emerson 0.7 Cu. Ft. Touch Control Microwave takes the guesswork out of microwave cooking and reheating. This versatile countertop oven combines a sleek silver finish and reflective glass door with advanced features like 10 power levels, a 99-minute timer, and 6 handy presets for one-touch cooking of popular foods. The spacious 0.7 cubic foot interior easily accommodates dinner plates up to 12 inches, while the 700 watts of power lets you quickly cook, reheat, or defrost a wide variety of foods. Intuitive touch controls make operation a breeze. Bring restaurant-quality results to your kitchen with the Emerson Touch Control Microwave.
